_metadata.description: Network operations and testing platform requirements

requirements.title: HTTP client operations (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH) with headers and authentication
requirements.description: Comprehensive HTTP client supporting all standard methods with full header control and multiple authentication schemes (basic, bearer, OAuth2, API key).

requirements.title: DNS operations (lookup, reverse lookup, record queries)
requirements.description: DNS query capabilities for A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, SOA, NS records with support for custom DNS servers and DNSSEC validation.

validation.notes: DNS handler tests with record type validation

requirements.title: Port scanning and service detection
requirements.description: TCP port scanning with service detection capabilities for identifying running services on target hosts.

requirements.title: Network connectivity testing
requirements.description: TCP-based connectivity testing with ping, traceroute, and connection validation capabilities.

requirements.title: SSL/TLS certificate validation and security analysis
requirements.description: Certificate chain validation, expiration checking, and security analysis for SSL/TLS connections.

requirements.title: RESTful API with comprehensive network operation endpoints
requirements.description: Complete REST API providing all network operations through well-documented endpoints with OpenAPI specification.

requirements.title: CLI interface with full feature parity
requirements.description: Command-line interface providing access to all network operations with comprehensive help and examples.

validation.notes: CLI BATS tests for all commands

requirements.title: Bandwidth and latency testing with statistical analysis
requirements.description: Network performance testing with bandwidth measurement, latency analysis, and statistical reporting (min/max/avg/stddev).

requirements.title: Automated API testing with request/response validation
requirements.description: Framework for automated API testing with validation of request/response schemas and assertions.

requirements.title: Service discovery and endpoint cataloging
requirements.description: Automatic discovery of API endpoints from OpenAPI specifications and cataloging of discovered services.

requirements.title: Performance monitoring with alerting and trending
requirements.description: Continuous monitoring of network performance metrics with alerting capabilities and trend analysis.

requirements.title: Security vulnerability scanning and reporting
requirements.description: Automated security vulnerability scanning with comprehensive reporting and remediation guidance.

requirements.title: Load testing with concurrent connection management
requirements.description: Load testing capabilities with concurrent connection management and performance analysis under stress.

requirements.title: Network topology discovery and visualization
requirements.description: Discovery and visualization of network topology including routing paths and network relationships.

requirements.title: WebSocket support for real-time communication testing
requirements.description: WebSocket protocol support for testing real-time communication channels.

requirements.title: Proxy and gateway configuration management
requirements.description: Support for configuring and managing proxy servers and gateways for network operations.
